Articles.Content:
Now that we've got a (somewhat) working fix for the editor problem, I thought I would try my hand at building a Minmus mining base again, but apparently the Kraken is having none of it, and it's on 64-bit Unity steroids.

So basically I have my lander landed on Minmus with a EL Survey Station attached. Jeb and Val are in the lander's command pod while Bill and two other engineers are in the survey station.. I use a survey stake to build a little stationary pod out of an EL Construction workshop, a metal-ore auger and smelter, and a few hex cans. After the build is finished I send Bill out to detach one of the connector ports from the workshop pod, attach it to the lander, then link the two. I then send Bill into the workshop.

At that point, my intent is to send another one of the engineers out and into the workshop, while my last remaining engineer goes out to place a second stake for the main part of my mining base (the workshop is just there to source RocketParts since I've already used up what I took with me). However, at that point anytime I go EVA with any of the astronauts in the lander, the game CTD's right there.

I'm fairly certain it has something to do with the fact that the ships are now linked together via the connector ports, since Bill is already EVA when the ships are linked, and the first EVA I send out after the link causes the crash. That would point toward KIS/KAS being part of the problem - however I won't rule out EPL as a possible related issue.

Here is my output log, as well as craft files of my lander and workshop pod so you can try to recreate. For all the parts, you'll need KAS, KIS, EPL, TAC Life Support (for the support cans), Tweakscale (for the Minmus lander's LV) and Nertea's Near Future mods (NF Spacecraft/Electrical for the lander and NF Solar for the module). The steps are listed below - this is basically the entire process from launch to crash, though you can likely use HyperEdit or somesuch to skip ahead to the lander/construction pod scenario. Also note that by the time the lander lands on Minmus, everything below the 7x RocketParts hexcan container has been decoupled.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1x742nq7qlyw30u/output_log.zip?dl=0

====Prep====
1. Launch lander craft with 1+ Kerbals in command pod, 2+ Kerbals in survey station, and full container of RocketParts

2. Fly to and land on Minmus
3. Send Kerbal on EVA to place survey stake
4. Construct workshop pod

====Crash Recreation Steps====
1. Send Kerbal on EVA with connector port and screwdriver
2. Attach connection port to lander
3. Link connection port on Lander to connection port on workshop pod
4. Send another Kerbal from the survey station on EVA

5. Crash!
